item.title: HTB SteamCloud Walkthrough
item.description: Detailed Streamcloud HTB lab walkthrough focusing on Kubernetes pentesting. Covers environment setup, discovery (kubectl, API), misconfigured RBAC and serviceAccount abuse, privilege escalation techniques, persistence, and developer-focused remediation
